data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Tonghua, Jilin, China.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tonghua, Jilin, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Tonghua, Jilin, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Tonghua, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Tonghua, Jilin, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Xibe people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Xibe people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Xibe people is yours.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Tonghua, Jilin, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Tonghua, Jilin, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the county of Tonghua, Jilin, China has a population of 2,300,000.

We estimate Tonghua has 174,481 people who might know Jesus, 37,156 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,088,363 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Tonghua who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
